title: Cruyff 'emotional' at tributes following cancer diagnosis
text: Cruyff 'emotional' at tributes following cancer diagnosis Monday, 26 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) THE HAGUE, Netherlands (AP) It is not so much his failing health, but the current state of Dutch football that is leaving legendary midfielder Johan Cruyff dejected.
